LogTailer.py – A python log tailer¶

Platforms: Unix, Linux

Module author: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

LogTailer class¶

class LogTailer.LogTailer([pause])¶

Class that parses and tails the log4j logs according to the predefined levels in Log4J, which are warn, error, debug, info and fatal.l

addLog(Log log)¶
Add a Log to be parsed and tailed
posEnd()¶
Positions all the cursors to the end of the logs
parse(line)¶
Parses a line in the log to check if that line corresponds to a level predefined in Log4J
tailer()¶
Method that tails the logs provided in LogTailer
